tool_description: Generates visual content including photos, illustrations, and graphics based on text descriptions and style parameters.

prompt.description: Text description of the desired image content

style.description: Visual style: realistic, cartoon, minimalist, vintage, modern, abstract

aspect_ratio.description: Image proportions: square, portrait, landscape, story

error_messages: Invalid prompt: Provide a descriptive text prompt with at least 5 words.
Unsupported style: Use one of [realistic, cartoon, minimalist, vintage, modern, abstract].
Invalid aspect ratio: Use one of [square, portrait, landscape, story].
usage: Provide a descriptive prompt and style preference. Optionally specify aspect_ratio for different social media formats.

image_url.description: URL or path to the generated image file

dimensions.description: Image dimensions in pixels (width x height)

style_applied.description: The style that was applied to the image
